question: A and B together can do a piece of work in 12 days, while B alone can finish it in 30 days. A alone can finish the work in :
explanation:
A\'s 1 day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{12}-\\frac{1}{30} = \\frac{5-2}{60} = \\frac{3}{60} = \\frac{1}{20}&s=1$
So, A alone will complete the work in 20 days.
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
